Ive tried 1) downloading data from wget from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata/raw/master/eng.traineddata>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata/raw/master/eng.traineddata</denchmark-link> and placed this data in tessdata/best/eng.traineddata, however this does not resolve the error Let me know if there is anything else I should do to fix this error? <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Suggested Fix:</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: You'll need <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/eng.traineddata>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/eng.traineddata</denchmark-link> . It is a known bug that Tesseract crashes when training with fast models (either from tessdata_fast or tessdata) is tried. See issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/issues/1573>#1573</denchmark-link> .
as directed I placed above file in tessdata/best/eng.traineddata . However the error persists. Should I redo the entire steps from beginning of the tutorial ? to solve this problem

Ive tried 1) downloading data from wget from https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata/raw/master/eng.traineddata [...]
That's the wrong download link.

I solved this error by A) Deleting everything and then reinstalling tesseract from here: git clone <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract.git>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract.git</denchmark-link>
B) cd tesseract/tessdata C) sudo mkdir best D) cd best E) wget <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/eng.traineddata>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/eng.traineddata</denchmark-link>
wget <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/heb.traineddata>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/heb.traineddata</denchmark-link>
wget <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/chi_sim.traineddata>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/master/chi_sim.traineddata</denchmark-link>
Now you have all the correct stuff needed to run this tutorial. Geez !! the files required to run this tutorial are all over the world. Someone please combine this into a single github repo wherein you can git clone and follow the instructions.
